WorkItem.Description:
I have a problem with the TypeScript extension for VS 2012 (for Windows 8):

I don't have any syntax highlighting on *.ts files!

 

I have already reinstalled both VS 2012 for Windows 8 and the TypeScript extension (and its *.vsix).

I hvae also posted this on StackOverflow: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/13366580/typescript-syntax-highlighting-for-vs-2012-for-windows-8
WorkItem.Summary: TypeScript Syntax highlighting for VS 2012 for Windows 8

Comments.Message:
I have solved the problem by installing Visual Studio 2012 Professional.

BUT TypeScript Syntax highlighting should really be implemented for the Express versions, too!

The TypeScript Visual Studio plugin works with Web Express 2012, and includes some project templates for web development.  We do not yet have the developer experiences for Windows 8 application development fleshed out fully, so do not yet support the Windows 8 Express product.  We expect to add this support in the future along with more complete Windows 8 application development support.
